title: Old ground new ground school ground
creator_credit: Open Channel Productions and John Nicoll
brief_description: An interview based documentary in which six Melbourne school students from non-English speaking backgrounds talk freely about themselves, their feelings and aspirations, and their experiences in Australian schools and Australian society.
description: An interview based documentary in which six Melbourne school students from non-English speaking backgrounds talk freely about themselves, their feelings and aspirations, and their experiences in Australian schools and Australian society.
